scripts.build: pnpm run clean-build && pnpm run --parallel -r build --declaration
scripts.dev: pnpm run clean-build && pnpm run --parallel -r build --watch --declaration --sourceMap --preserveWatchOutput
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist node_modules && pnpm -r exec rm -rf dist node_modules
scripts.test: pnpm build && pnpm test:unit && pnpm test:runtime
scripts.test:runtime: pnpm --parallel --filter neemata-test-bun --filter neemata-test-deno --filter neemata-test-node run test
scripts.check: pnpm run check:fmt && pnpm run check:lint && pnpm run check:type
